languages.text: {n}Сложив руки в священную {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}, Арджента громко выкрикивает: "Да хранит Император династию фон Валанциус!" Толпа рьяно подхватывает этот клич, иступленно повторяя его.{/n}
{n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сложив руки в священную {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}, Арджента громко выкрикивает: "Да хранит Император династию фон Валанциус!" Толпа рьяно подхватывает этот клич, иступленно повторяя его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を作ってアルジェンタは叫ぶ。「皇帝よ、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝を守りたまえ！」群衆は熱心に聖句を覚えて繰り返す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を作ってアルジェンタは叫ぶ。「皇帝よ、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝を守りたまえ！」群衆は熱心に聖句を覚えて繰り返す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势，高呼道：“愿神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”霎时间，人群欢声如雷，随她一同高声祝祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势，高呼道：“愿神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”霎时间，人群欢声如雷，随她一同高声祝祷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} y grita: «¡Que el Emperador proteja a la dinastía von Valancius!». La multitud, fervorosa, sigue su ejemplo y lo corea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} y grita: «¡Que el Emperador proteja a la dinastía von Valancius!». La multitud, fervorosa, sigue su ejemplo y lo corea.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta s'écrie :{/n} « Que l'Empereur garde la dynastie von Valancius ! » {n}La foule reprend ses paroles avec ferveur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta s'écrie :{/n} « Que l'Empereur garde la dynastie von Valancius ! » {n}La foule reprend ses paroles avec ferveur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta macht das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g} und ruft: "Der Imperator bewahre die Dynastie von Valancius!" Die Menge nimmt den Satz sofort auf und wiederholt ihn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta macht das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g} und ruft: "Der Imperator bewahre die Dynastie von Valancius!" Die Menge nimmt den Satz sofort auf und wiederholt ihn.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapan Argenta, "İmparator, von Valancius hanedanlığını korur!" diye bağırıyor. Kalabalık, sloganı kapıp hevesle tekrarlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, Argenta shouts out, "Emperor keep the von Valancius dynasty!" The crowd zealously picks up the chant, repeating it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapan Argenta, "İmparator, von Valancius hanedanlığını korur!" Kalabalık, sloganı kapıp hevesle tekrarlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
